text:
Some Apache 2.2.2 documentation references "AuthLDAPAuthoritative" rather than the "AuthzLDAPAuthoritative" used in the code and in other documentation. Either "AuthLDAP..." or "AuthzLDAP..." should be used throughout. --ado Script started on Tue 27 Jun 2006 01:44:00 PM EDT lecserver$ pwd /mnt/olsona/src/httpd-2.2.2 lecserver$ grep -i auth.*ldapauthoritative `find * -name "*ldap*" -print` docs/manual/mod/mod_ldap.html.en: AuthLDAPAuthoritative on
docs/manual/mod/mod_ldap.html.en: AuthLDAPAuthoritative on
docs/manual/mod/mod_ldap.html.en: AuthLDAPAuthoritative on
docs/manual/mod/mod_ldap.html.en: AuthLDAPAuthoritative on
docs/manual/mod/mod_ldap.html.en: AuthLDAPAuthoritative on
docs/manual/mod/mod_authnz_ldap.html.en:
  • AuthzLDAPAuthoritative
    • docs/manual/mod/mod_authnz_ldap.html.en: Auth zLDAPAuthoritative docs/manual/mod/mod_authnz_ldap.html.en:AuthzLDAPAuthoritative off docs/manual/mod/mod_authnz_ldap.html.en:

    A uthzLDAPAuthoritative docs/manual/mod/mod_authnz_ldap.html.en:

    AuthzLDAPAuthoritative Directive

    docs/manual/mod/mod_authnz_ldap.html.en:Syntax:< code>AuthzLDAPAuthoritative on|off docs/manual/mod/mod_authnz_ldap.html.en:Default:AuthzLDAPAuthoritative on modules/aaa/mod_authnz_ldap.c: AP_INIT_FLAG("AuthzLDAPAuthoritative", ap_set_flag_slot, lecserver$ exit script done on Tue 27 Jun 2006 01:44:10 PM EDT
creator: arthur_david_olson@nih.gov

text: Fixed in both trunk and 2.2 branch
creator: bnicholes@apache.org
